mapper.select: SELECT value3 id,COUNT(value3) address,gc.company_name companyName FROM gov_information_resource_main grm,gov_company gc WHERE grm.value3=gc.id AND STATUS=0 AND grm.isDeleted=0 AND gc.isDeleted=0 GROUP BY value3 ,company_name ORDER BY address DESC
select value3,count(id) status from gov_information_resource_main where status=0 and isDeleted=0 group by value3

SELECT t.id,source_type sourceType,value1,value2,value3,value4,value5,value6,value7,value8,value9,value10,value11,value12,value13,value14,value15,value16,value17,value18,value19,value20,value21,value22,value23,value24,value25,value26,value27,value28,value29,value30,inforTypes,inforTypes2,inforTypes3,inforTypes4,binforTypes,binforTypes2,binforTypes3,binforTypes4, t.time_create timeCreate, t.time_modified timeModified, t.isDeleted, t.company_id companyId, t.group_id groupId, t.reason, t.status FROM gov_information_resource_main t,gov_data_list l where l.data_manager_id=t.id and l.data_element_id in (${ids}) and t.isDeleted=0
mapper.insert:
SELECT gov_information_res_main_seq.CURRVAL ID FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO gov_information_resource_main(source_type,value1,value2,value3,value4,value5,value6,value7,value8,value9,value10,value11,value12,value13,value14,value15,value16,value17,value18,value19,value20,value21,value22,value23,value24,value25,value26,value27,value28,value29,value30,inforTypes,inforTypes2,inforTypes3,inforTypes4,binforTypes,binforTypes2,binforTypes3,binforTypes4,time_create,time_modified,isDeleted,company_id,group_id,status,reason) VALUES (#{sourceType,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{value1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value16,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value17,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value18,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value19,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value20,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value21,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value22,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value23,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value24,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value25,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value26,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value27,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value28,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value29,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{value30,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{inforTypes,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{inforTypes2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{inforTypes3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{inforTypes4,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{binforTypes,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{binforTypes2,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{binforTypes3,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{binforTypes4,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{timeCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{timeModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{isDeleted,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{companyId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{groupId,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE gov_information_resource_main SET isDeleted =1 WHERE id in
#{o.id}

UPDATE gov_information_resource_main SET value1=#{value1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value2=#{value2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value3=#{value3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value4=#{value4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value5=#{value5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value6=#{value6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value7=#{value7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value8=#{value8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value9=#{value9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value10=#{value10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value11=#{value11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value12=#{value12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value13=#{value13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value14=#{value14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value15=#{value15,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value16=#{value16,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value17=#{value17,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value18=#{value18,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value19=#{value19,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value20=#{value20,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value21=#{value21,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value22=#{value22,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value23=#{value23,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value24=#{value24,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value25=#{value25,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value26=#{value26,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value27=#{value27,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value28=#{value28,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value29=#{value29,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value30=#{value30,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inforTypes=#{inforTypes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, inforTypes2=#{inforTypes2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, inforTypes3=#{inforTypes3,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, inforTypes4=#{inforTypes4,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, binforTypes=#{binforTypes,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, binforTypes2=#{binforTypes2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, binforTypes3=#{binforTypes3,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, binforTypes4=#{binforTypes4,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, status=#{status,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, reason=#{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_modified=#{timeModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE id=#{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
UPDATE gov_information_resource_main SET status=0 WHERE status=1
UPDATE gov_information_resource_main SET value${valueNo}='' WHERE id>0
mapper.select: SELECT time_modified FROM gov_information_resource_main WHERE status = 0 and rownum<2 AND isDeleted = 0 AND value3 = #{cpId} ORDER BY time_modified DESC
